name: Bose Noise Cancelling Headphones 700
description: The Bose 700 wireless headphones have redefined what wireless headphones can do. Get easy access to voice assistants for music, navigation, and weather.

name: Apple MacBook Pro 13-inch
description: Apple MacBook Pro with a powerful M1 chip, 13-inch Retina display, and exceptional performance for professionals and students alike.

name: Google Nest Thermostat
description: Google Nest Thermostat allows you to control your home’s temperature with your phone. It learns your schedule and automatically adjusts to save energy.

name: Fitbit Charge 5 Fitness Tracker
description: Fitbit Charge 5 helps track your steps, heart rate, and sleep quality, offering a comprehensive look at your overall health and fitness.

name: LG 55-Inch 4K Ultra HD Smart OLED TV
description: Enjoy stunning picture quality with the LG 55-inch OLED TV, featuring vivid colors and deep blacks for an immersive viewing experience.

name: Sony WH-1000XM4 Wireless Headphones
description: Sony WH-1000XM4 headphones offer industry-leading noise cancellation and crystal-clear sound quality for an unparalleled listening experience.

name: GoPro HERO9 Black Action Camera
description: Capture stunning 5K videos and photos with the GoPro HERO9 Black. It features a front display and rear touchscreen for enhanced control and framing.

name: Dyson V11 Cordless Vacuum Cleaner
description: Dyson V11 offers powerful suction for deep cleaning, with a long-lasting battery and lightweight design for easy maneuverability.

name: Apple iPad Air 64GB
description: The new iPad Air delivers more power than most laptops with the A14 Bionic chip, featuring a beautiful 10.9-inch Liquid Retina display.

name: JBL Flip 5 Portable Waterproof Speaker
description: Enjoy booming bass and crystal-clear sound with the JBL Flip 5. It’s perfect for outdoor adventures with its waterproof design.

name: Ring Video Doorbell 3
description: See, hear, and speak to visitors from your phone with the Ring Video Doorbell 3. It offers improved motion detection and dual-band Wi-Fi.

name: Anker PowerCore 10000 Portable Charger
description: The Anker PowerCore 10000 is one of the smallest and lightest power banks on the market, providing high-speed charging for your devices.

name: Microsoft Surface Laptop 4
description: Microsoft Surface Laptop 4 offers a perfect balance of style, speed, and performance with its 13.5-inch PixelSense display and long battery life.

name: Roku Streaming Stick+
description: Roku Streaming Stick+ makes it easy to enjoy your favorite streaming content in HD, 4K, and HDR. It’s portable and easy to set up on any TV.

name: Nintendo Switch Console
description: Nintendo Switch lets you play at home or on the go with its versatile design. Enjoy great games on a large, vibrant screen anywhere.

name: Canon PIXMA Wireless All-In-One Printer
description: Canon PIXMA offers wireless printing, scanning, and copying, making it perfect for home or small office use with high-quality results.

name: HP Envy 6055e All-in-One Printer
description: The HP Envy 6055e is an all-in-one printer that offers wireless printing, copying, and scanning for everyday home and office needs.

name: Apple Watch Series 7
description: The Apple Watch Series 7 features the largest and most advanced display yet, offering comprehensive health tracking and seamless connectivity with iOS devices.

name: Dell XPS 13 9310 Laptop
description: The Dell XPS 13 is a premium ultraportable laptop with a stunning 13.4-inch InfinityEdge display, powerful Intel processor, and long-lasting battery life.

name: Garmin Forerunner 245 Music
description: Garmin Forerunner 245 Music offers advanced running dynamics, built-in GPS, and the ability to store up to 500 songs for a seamless workout experience.

name: Sony Alpha a7 III Mirrorless Camera
description: Sony Alpha a7 III features a 24.2MP full-frame sensor, 4K video recording, and advanced autofocus for stunning photos and videos.

name: Samsung Galaxy Buds Pro
description: Samsung Galaxy Buds Pro offer studio-quality sound, active noise cancellation, and a comfortable fit for all-day wear.

name: Razer BlackWidow V3 Mechanical Gaming Keyboard
description: The Razer BlackWidow V3 features mechanical switches for precise keystrokes, customizable RGB lighting, and ergonomic design for long gaming sessions.

name: Eufy RoboVac 11S Slim Robot Vacuum
description: Eufy RoboVac 11S is a super-slim robot vacuum with powerful suction, ideal for cleaning carpets, hard floors, and tight spaces.

name: DJI Mavic Air 2 Drone
description: Capture stunning aerial footage with the DJI Mavic Air 2, featuring a 48MP camera, 4K video recording, and intelligent flight modes.

name: Sonos Beam Smart Soundbar
description: The Sonos Beam delivers rich, room-filling sound and supports Alexa, Google Assistant, and Apple AirPlay 2 for a complete smart home experience.

name: Corsair Vengeance RGB Pro 16GB RAM
description: Corsair Vengeance RGB Pro offers high-performance DDR4 memory with dynamic multi-zone RGB lighting, perfect for custom PC builds.

name: Philips Hue White and Color Ambiance Starter Kit
description: Philips Hue starter kit includes 4 smart LED bulbs and a hub, allowing you to control the lights with your smartphone or voice commands.

name: Netgear Nighthawk AX6 WiFi 6 Router
description: The Netgear Nighthawk AX6 router supports the latest WiFi 6 standard, providing faster speeds, more capacity, and better coverage for all your devices.

name: Oculus Quest 2 Virtual Reality Headset
description: Oculus Quest 2 offers an immersive virtual reality experience with stunning graphics and a wireless design, perfect for gaming and exploring VR worlds.

name: Belkin BoostCharge Pro 3-in-1 Wireless Charger
description: Charge your iPhone, Apple Watch, and AirPods simultaneously with the Belkin BoostCharge Pro 3-in-1 wireless charger, offering fast and efficient charging.

name: Kasa Smart Plug Mini
description: Control your devices remotely with the Kasa Smart Plug Mini, compatible with Alexa and Google Assistant for easy voice control.

name: NVIDIA Shield TV Pro
description: The NVIDIA Shield TV Pro is the ultimate streaming device for 4K HDR content, gaming, and smart home control, with built-in Google Assistant.

name: Theragun Prime Percussive Therapy Device
description: Theragun Prime provides deep muscle treatment with percussive therapy, helping to relieve soreness and enhance recovery after workouts.

name: HyperX Cloud II Wireless Gaming Headset
description: The HyperX Cloud II offers immersive sound, a noise-cancelling microphone, and a comfortable design for long gaming sessions.

name: Lenovo Smart Clock 2 with Wireless Charging Dock
description: The Lenovo Smart Clock 2 keeps you organized with voice control and includes a wireless charging dock for added convenience.

name: Bose SoundLink Revolve+ Bluetooth Speaker
description: Enjoy deep, loud, and immersive sound with the Bose SoundLink Revolve+, a portable Bluetooth speaker with 360-degree audio.

name: Samsung Odyssey G7 Curved Gaming Monitor
description: The Samsung Odyssey G7 features a 32-inch QHD curved display with a 240Hz refresh rate, providing an immersive gaming experience.

name: Canon SELPHY CP1300 Compact Photo Printer
description: Print high-quality photos directly from your smartphone with the Canon SELPHY CP1300, a compact and portable photo printer.
